Symbol Shapes

Opens the Symbol Shapes toolbar from which you can insert graphics into your document.

To access this command...

Symbol Shapes


Click an icon on the Symbol Shapes toolbar, and then drag in the document to draw the shape.

Some shapes have a special handle which you can drag to change the properties of the shape. The mouse pointer changes to a hand symbol over these special handles.
